Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl

Class GraphServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.service.impl.GraphServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphService
@Service public class GraphServiceImpl extends Object implements GraphService
Service implementation for managing graphs. This class provides methods for CRUD operations on graphs and their relationships.
